item.title: 6 diddle displacements
item.description: La video de Quincy Davis. Why? Freer application of diddles Better organized stickings Speed/fluidity (bring accents out) Playing inner partials Exercises Snare only Paradiddle displacement Paradiddles restart one 16th later every bar.

item.title: Another 5ta scale we should all know
item.description: La video de Rich Brown. La grosse leçon: 1 shape + 1 shape = 1 shape

item.title: How well do you know your major scales
item.description: La video de Rich Brown. corde de Mi avec le majeur : 24124134 corde de Mi avec l’auriculaire : 41341241 2 notes par corde, sympa pour plans par tierces

item.title: Why 99% of Intermediate Guitarists STOP Making Progress
item.description: La video de Ross Campbell. 1 Music theory is a language not a set of rules You are never smarter not knowing something.
